text:
Hello, Is it possible to implement *AMP* in HubSpot email templates.

<https://amp.dev/documentation/templates/>

Hi <@UEYNCDE2Y> i think HubSpot provide AMP only for website not for emails.
 For Emails you can use inline css and compressed images.
Hi folks, this would be better suited to the <#CJ5DN6RKP|email-development> channel, this one is just related to our beta drag and drop email editor
In saying that, AMP is something that we're aware of. It's not possible yet but we're looking into it
